title.rendered: 2019 Winner of the NCC Pediatric Device Pitch Competition

content.rendered: PyrAmes was one of six pediatric device companies to win the “Make Your Medical Device Pitch for Kids!” program during the 7th Annual Pediatric Device Innovation Symposium. The program was developed to assist medical device companies in improving care in the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU). The Symposium is sponsored by Children’s National Hospital and the National Capital Consortium for Pediatric Device Innovation (NCC-PDI).
